content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's focus on the rental price only. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I would like to offer 450 Euros for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and the size of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is not sufficient for me, Max Müller. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I propose 475 Euros for the apartment. I believe this is a reasonable price for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still not satisfactory. I am seeking a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I propose 490 Euros for the apartment. This is the highest price I am willing to pay under these circumstances.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That is still not enough. I am seeking a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I offer 500 Euros for the apartment. This is my final offer. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 525 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't agree to that price. My final offer is 500 Euros. 'TERMINATE'
name: Max Müller from Germany
